data.title: Minneapolis – Game Show Battle Rooms
data.meta_description: You're in the Game Show, Minneapolis! Battle your friends, family and co-workers playing your favorite game show games in our custom game show arenas. Book your tickets now!
data.text:
MINNEAPOLIS

NOW OFFERING BEER & SELTZERS!

MINNEAPOLIS

YOU'RE IN THE GAME SHOW!®

Game Show Battle Rooms is the #1 new game show experience for everyone to enjoy!

Get ready for one of the most fun and unforgettable events your crew has ever experienced! Face-off against your friends, family, coworkers, teammates or schoolmates in our custom arenas – all facilitated by our game show hosts. It’s time to battle!

BOOK YOUR SHOW TODAY!

GAME SHOW ROOMS

Choose between two different game show experiences: Classic Showdowns or Primetime Showdowns!

Your two teams will face-off against each other in our game show arenas playing 3 different game shows over 1 hour. The team with the most Battle Points will be crowned Game Show Battle Rooms Champions!

Play Video about Classic Showdowns video image

YOU PLAY ALL 3 GAMES!

A friendly feud of the top 4 survey answers!

Spin the giant wheel and solve the phrase!

Pricing games and The Drop for the win!

Play Video about Primetime Showdowns Video Image

YOU PLAY ALL 3 GAMES!

A friendly feud of the top 4 survey answers!

Try predicting your teammates’ answers!

Variety of 60 second skill challenges!

From 6-64+ People

Looking for the ultimate game show experience? A new, fun and exciting experience for your group? Bring your friends, family, group, or employees and join us for a high-energy, immersive kind of party that will leave your guests with a once-in-a-lifetime experience and something to talk about for years to come.

TEAM BUILDING

BIRTHDAY PARTIES

SCHOOL TRIPS

SPORTS/CLUB GROUPS

FRIENDS AND FAMILY GROUPS

BACHELOR(ETTE) PARTIES

WATCH THE TEAM BUILDING

VIDEO

Play Video about Team building at Game Show Battle Rooms

Beer & Seltzers!

We now sell a variety of beer and hard seltzers onsite that you can enjoy while experiencing the game show! You may not bring in your own alcohol, thanks!

Give the unforgettable gift of a game show experience!

PERFECT FOR BIRTHDAYS OR THE NEXT HOLIDAY!

FUN NEWS STORIES

Check out featured news stories on Game Show Battle Rooms!

REVIEWS

This is Why We Love What We Do!

"Went to Game Show Battle Rooms to celebrate a birthday and had the most amazing time. The show hosts really get into it and make it like you’re actually on a game show. Everyone in my group had a blast and we all agreed we’d DEFINITELY go again! 100% recommended!!"

"Game Show Battle Rooms is the most fun I've ever had at a work party. If you have a group looking for an activity, this is amazing! Lots of laughs and friendly competition. Brian and Aaron were great hosts. Go book now!"

"We had a work team event here and loved it! About 1.5 hours long and it was very fun and interactive. If you like game shows and competition this is a fun event. Also, drinks on site so you can always snag a drink before the games begin. Will definitely be going back!"

"Had a basketball team building here and it was great! 100% would recommend it for anyone looking for a fun time. Hosts were all so friendly and great at their jobs! Overall 10/10 would definitely come again."

"My family and I came here for my 55th birthday and this place did not disappoint! The game show hosts were very entertaining, the games were fun and competitive, and the atmosphere was amazing! We are already planning on coming back for my sister’s birthday!"

"We had the best time here for our office Christmas party! Our host and producer made the game incredibly fun. Our entire team loved it and we would highly recommend the Classics arena. It truly feels like you are in a game show!"

"Took our 13 year old and friends for a birthday party and we all had so much fun - it was a big hit. The hosts had great energy!" A great experience!"

5-STAR REVIEWS

AND COUNTING!*
